infoparam.name: List of all parameters of an Avatar SMD transition
List of all parameters of an Avatar SMD transition

entryCode.value: printf("Reading value of vibration sensor: %d\n", read_gpio2vci("vibration_sensor"));

Attribute.listStruct: offset_ = -8.0E-6 : const double|amplitude_ = 4.0E-6 : const double|f_0_ = 2000.0 : const double|n_period_ = 8 : const int|n_harmonic_ = 2 : const int
k_ = 1.0 : double|start_up_ = true : bool|x_in_last_ = 0.0 : double|x_dot_ = 0.0 : double
low_threshold_ = 3 : const int|high_threshold_ = 9 : const int|k_min_ = 0 : const int|k_max_ = 16 : const int|k_ = 8 : int|state_ = 0 : int
